thread.title: Snowboarder backflips off a moving car like it's nbd
thread.title_full: Snowboarder backflips off a moving car like it's nbd

author: Samantha Speedy
title: Snowboarder backflips off a moving car like it's nbd
text:
Snowboarding is not for the faint of heart.
In what had potential to be an incredibly stressful viewing experience, professional snowboarder Martin Agerstig heads directly at a moving car, only to turn out a miraculous backflip.
SEE ALSO: Watch this skier straight up trigger an avalanche
Swedish film group RackartygarnaTV tracked Martin's efforts to complete the "world's first snowboard backflip on a running car" in a video with plenty of bone-crushing (and window-crushing) failures.
Here's an anxiety-inducing clip of the experience.
This insane backflip off a moving car. RIDER: @martinagerstig #snow #SHAREtheFeed #CHECKtheFeed #snowboarding @checkthefeed
A video posted by Jacob Starnes (@ja.starnes) on Jan 7, 2017 at 4:39pm PST
Do not try this at home. Or work. Really just anywhere. Don't do it.
BONUS: New smart ball is a learning tool specially designed for autistic children
